name: CreateGithubProjectCard
description:
Create a project card in a specified GitHub column.

Use this tool to create a new project card in a specified column within a GitHub project. It helps organize tasks or notes in a project on GitHub.

parameters.name: column_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the GitHub project column where the card will be added.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the column.

parameters.name: project_card_details
parameters.description: Details for the new GitHub project card as a JSON object. Include fields like 'note' for card content or 'content_id' and 'content_type' for linking issues or pull requests.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: column_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the column.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the column.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
